name: Sweet and Sour Meatloaf
author: JOLO
summary: Our family loves this meatloaf! It's covered with a tangy sweet and sour sauce made on the stove. It is very good!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, bread crumbs, salt, ground black pepper, eggs, onion flakes and 1/2 of the can of tomato sauce
Mix together well and place into a 5x9 inch loaf pan
Push the meatloaf down into the pan forming a well for the sauce around all the edges
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 40 minutes
Meanwhile, in a small saucepan over medium heat, combine the remaining tomato sauce, brown sugar, vinegar, white sugar and mustard
Bring to a boil and remove from heat
After meatloaf has cooked for 40 minutes, remove from oven and pour sauce over the top of the meatloaf
Return to oven and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 20 more minutes
Let sit 5 minutes before removing from pan
